## Standings

```{r libs, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r read_record, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
record <- read_csv("data/past_records.csv")
```

### 2018

```{r standings_2018, echo=FALSE}
record %>% 
  filter(year == 2018) %>% 
  select(-year) %>% 
  arrange(rank) %>% 
  kable(digits = 2)
```
